name: Disco Blast
description:
Shoot as many of the light balls you can! Shot balls may drop improved weapons and you can combine found weapons into even better weapons! But you better hurry, because weapons will quickly expire!

Note: the music may be lagging in Chrome. If you run into this problem, you can try playing on Firefox or downloading the game.

Controls
Movement: W/A/S/D
Aim & Fire: Mouse

Resources
Music: Factory by Evan King
Font: Vezla by Jorge Algarin

Made for Weekly Game Jam #196

Check out more of our games at https://two-flying-cats.itch.io/
